targets.query:
import "date"
import "array"
import "contrib/tomhollingworth/events"

start = from(bucket: "stoppage_monitoring")
 |> range(start: date.sub(d:1d,from:v.timeRangeStart), stop: v.timeRangeStart)
 |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "fault_tracking")
 |> filter(fn: (r) => r["machine_name"] == "${machine}")
 |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
 |> keep(columns: ["_time","running","status","machine_name"])
 |> last(column: "_time")
 |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _time: v.timeRangeStart}))

body = from(bucket: "stoppage_monitoring")
 |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
 |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "fault_tracking")
//  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "running")
 |> filter(fn: (r) => r["machine_name"] == "${machine}")
 |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
 |> keep(columns: ["_time","running","status","machine_name"])

dataset = union(tables: [start,body])


dataset
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])
  |> events.duration(unit: 1s, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["status"] != "Shift End")
  |> group(columns: ["running"])
  |> sum(column: "duration")
  |> pivot(rowKey: [], columnKey: ["running"], valueColumn: "duration")
  |> keep(columns: ["true","false"])
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({ utilisation: if r.false!=0 then float(v:r.true) / float(v:r.true+r.false) *100.0 else 100.0}))
  |> keep(columns: ["utilisation"])

import "date"
import "array"
import "contrib/tomhollingworth/events"

start = from(bucket: "stoppage_monitoring")
 |> range(start: date.sub(d:1d,from:v.timeRangeStart), stop: v.timeRangeStart)
 |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "fault_tracking")
//  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "running")
 |> filter(fn: (r) => r["machine_name"] == "${machine}")
 |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
 |> keep(columns: ["_time","running","status","machine_name"])
 |> last(column: "_time")
 |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _time: v.timeRangeStart}))

body = from(bucket: "stoppage_monitoring")
 |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
 |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "fault_tracking")
//  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "running")
 |> filter(fn: (r) => r["machine_name"] == "${machine}")
 |> pivot(rowKey: ["_time"], columnKey: ["_field"], valueColumn: "_value")
 |> keep(columns: ["_time","running","status","machine_name"])

dataset = union(tables: [start,body])


dataset
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])
  |> events.duration(unit: 1s, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["status"] != "Shift End")
  |> group(columns: ["running"])
  |> sum(column: "duration")
  |> pivot(rowKey: [], columnKey: ["running"], valueColumn: "duration")
  |> keep(columns: ["true","false"])
  |> map(
    fn: (r) => ({r with false: if exists r.false then r.false else 0, true: if exists r.true then r.true else 0}),
  )

import "date"

start = from(bucket: "stoppage_monitoring")
 |> range(start: date.sub(d:1d,from:v.timeRangeStart), stop: v.timeRangeStart)
 |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "fault_tracking")
 |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "status")
 |> filter(fn: (r) => r["machine_name"] == "${machine}")
 |> keep(columns: ["_time","_value","_field","machine_name"])
 |> last()
 |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _time: v.timeRangeStart}))

body = from(bucket: "stoppage_monitoring")
 |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
 |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "fault_tracking")
 |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "status")
 |> filter(fn: (r) => r["machine_name"] == "${machine}")
 |> keep(columns: ["_time","_value","_field","machine_name"])

dataset = union(tables: [start,body])


dataset
  |> duplicate(column: "_value", as: "buckets")
  |> group(columns: ["buckets"], mode: "by")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["buckets"] != "Running" and r["buckets"] != "Shift End")
  |> count()

import "date"
import "array"
import "contrib/tomhollingworth/events"

start = from(bucket: "stoppage_monitoring")
 |> range(start: date.sub(d:1d,from:v.timeRangeStart), stop: v.timeRangeStart)
 |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "fault_tracking")
 |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "status")
 |> filter(fn: (r) => r["machine_name"] == "${machine}")
 |> keep(columns: ["_time","_value","_field","machine_name"])
 |> last()
 |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _time: v.timeRangeStart}))

body = from(bucket: "stoppage_monitoring")
 |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
 |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "fault_tracking")
 |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "status")
 |> filter(fn: (r) => r["machine_name"] == "${machine}")
 |> keep(columns: ["_time","_value","_field","machine_name"])

dataset = union(tables: [start,body])


dataset
  |> drop(columns: ["_start","_stop","status"])
  |> sort(columns: ["_time"])
  |> events.duration(unit: 1s, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> duplicate(column: "_value",as: "bucket")
  |> group(columns: ["bucket"])
  |> sum(column: "duration")
  |> pivot(rowKey: [], columnKey: ["bucket"], valueColumn: "duration")
  |> drop(columns: ["Running", "Shift End"])

import "date"

start = from(bucket: "stoppage_monitoring")
 |> range(start: date.sub(d:1d,from:v.timeRangeStart), stop: v.timeRangeStart)
 |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "fault_tracking")
 |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "status")
 |> filter(fn: (r) => r["machine_name"] == "${machine}")
 |> keep(columns: ["_time","_value","_field","machine_name"])
 |> last()
 |> map(fn: (r) => ({r with _time: v.timeRangeStart}))

body = from(bucket: "stoppage_monitoring")
 |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
 |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "fault_tracking")
 |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "status")
 |> filter(fn: (r) => r["machine_name"] == "${machine}")
 |> keep(columns: ["_time","_value","_field","machine_name"])

dataset = union(tables: [start,body])

dataset
 |> keep(columns: ["_value","_time"])

list.definition:
from(bucket: "stoppage_monitoring")
  |> range(start: -7d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "fault_tracking")
  |> keep(columns: ["machine_name"])
  |> distinct(column: "machine_name")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["machine_name"] != "null")
  |> group()
list.name: machine
list.query:
from(bucket: "stoppage_monitoring")
  |> range(start: -7d)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "fault_tracking")
  |> keep(columns: ["machine_name"])
  |> distinct(column: "machine_name")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["machine_name"] != "null")
  |> group()
